entries.original: 03f6e72c refactor(ultrawork): replace prometheus with plan agent, add parallel task graph output
entries.translation: Prometheus를 plan agent로 교체하고, 병렬 작업 그래프 출력을 추가

entries.original: 4fd9f0fd refactor(agents): enforce zero user intervention in QA/acceptance criteria
entries.translation: QA/수락 기준에서 사용자 개입을 제로로 강제

entries.original: 895f366a docs: add Ollama streaming NDJSON issue guide and workaround (#1197)
entries.translation: Ollama 스트리밍 NDJSON 문제 가이드 및 해결 방법 추가 (#1197)

entries.original: acc19fcd feat(hooks): auto-disable directory-agents-injector for OpenCode 1.1.37+ native support (#1204)
entries.translation: OpenCode 1.1.37+ 네이티브 지원을 위해 directory-agents-injector 자동 비활성화 (#1204)

entries.original: dee89c15 feat(delegate-task): add prometheus self-delegation block and delegate_task permission
entries.translation: Prometheus 자체 위임 차단 및 delegate_task 권한 추가

entries.original: 3dd80889 fix(tools): add permission field to session.create() for consistency (#1199)
entries.translation: 일관성을 위해 session.create()에 권한 필드 추가 (#1199)

entries.original: 8f6ed5b2 fix(hooks): add null guard for tool.execute.after output (#1054)
entries.translation: Tool.execute.after 출력에 대한 null 가드 추가 (#1054)

entries.original: 01500f1e fix: prevent system-reminder tags from triggering mode keywords (#1155)
entries.translation: System-reminder 태그가 모드 키워드를 트리거하지 않도록 방지 (#1155)

entries.original: 48f6c5e0 fix(skill): support YAML array format for allowed-tools field (#1163)
entries.translation: Allowed-tools 필드에 대한 YAML 배열 형식 지원 (#1163)

entries.original: 3e32afe6 fix(agent-variant): resolve variant based on current model, not static config (#1179)
entries.translation: 정적 구성 아닌 현재 모델 기반으로 변형 해결 (#1179)

entries.original: d11c4a1f fix: guard JSON.parse(result.stdout) with || "{}" fallback in hook handlers (#1191)
